Assassins commit murder, either for pay or due to their belief in a cause, such as a religion or a political movement. Many are members of assassins' guilds: organizations that accept contracts to kill in return for money, favors, or both. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 24 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 19 [Assassin](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3434) **Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 23 **Perception** +16 **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34) +17, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) +13, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38) +12, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39) +10, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40) +10, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=42) +14, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47) +12, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=48) +19, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=50) +15, [Underworld Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +14 **Str** +3 **Dex** +5 **Con** +2 **Int** +2 **Wis** +2 **Cha** +0 **Items** _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2829) [composite shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=435)_ (20 arrows), [lesser darkvision elixir](/Equipment.aspx?ID=89), [Giant Centipede Venom](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3334) (4), [_invisibility potion_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2944), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Lethargy Poison](/Equipment.aspx?ID=120) (3), _+1 [rapier](/Weapons.aspx?ID=391)_ --- **AC** 26 **Fort** +12 **Ref** +19 **Will** +14 **HP** 130 **Deny Advantage** The assassin isn't [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) to creatures of 8th level or lower that are [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=79), [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=96), flanking, or using surprise attack.
**Nimble Dodge** **Trigger** The assassin is targeted with a melee or ranged attack by an attacker it can see; **Effect** The assassin gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. --- **Speed** 25 feet, swift sneak **Melee** _rapier_ +20 ([deadly d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 1d6+9 piercing **Melee** fist +19 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)), **Damage** 1d4+9 bludgeoning **Ranged** _composite shortbow_ +20 ([deadly 2d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)), **Damage** 2d6+7 piercing **Assassin's Poison** ([Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Requirements** The assassin is wielding a piercing or slashing weapon and has a free hand; **Effect** The assassin applies a poison to the weapon. That poison's DC is increased to 24 if it was lower. **Quick Draw** The assassin Interacts to draw a weapon, then Strikes with that weapon. **Sneak Attack** The assassin deals an extra 2d6 precision damage to [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) creatures. **Surprise Attack** On the first round of combat, creatures that haven't acted yet are [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) to the assassin. **Swift Sneak** The assassin can move their full Speed when [Sneaking](/Actions.aspx?ID=2405).
name: Assassin
